item.title: Hugo blog site github local repo sync
item.description: Hugo Local Setup Testing hugo blog site github Create two repositories blog –> public local-devnull-hub.io –> public Clone blog local git or create with hugo new git clone http://localhost/user/blog.git cd to blog Create new hugo new site blog-local-devnull.io new empty site dire blog-local-devnull.io Choose themes Installation theme From project’s root directory, run: git clone https://github.com/vimux/mainroad.git themes/mainroad Or, if not planning to make any significant changes but want to track and update the theme, add it as a git submodule via the following command:
